plot: A collection of five shorts that explores the lives and feelings of gay men, some mature, others who are coming out. The collection includes "Is One of You Eddie?", "Different," "The Neighborly Thing," "Meet Joe Gay," and "A Good Son."
title: First Out
plot_es: A collection of five shorts that explores the lives and feelings of gay men, some mature, others who are coming out. The collection includes "Is One of You Eddie?", "Different," "The Neighborly Thing," "Meet Joe Gay," and "A Good Son."
